title: Data Artifact Registry Schema
description: Defines and registers all fundamental data artifacts and raw input keys referenced by SMS factor definitions.

registry_version.description: Semantic version of the artifact definitions.

artifacts.description: Map of data artifact definitions, keyed by their unique identifier (source_data_key in SMS).

data_type.description: The primary data type of the artifact.

source_system.description: The agent or system that generates or provides the artifact.

freshness_ttl_hours.description: Time-to-live for data validity, in hours.
